i just graduated college with my bachelor s degree in education.
i wish i could play the stock market well.

When I'm not taking care of my family, I like to go off-roading in my truck.

content.text: Hi! It's going well! Just got back from a long boat ride on the lake.
That sounds fun! I love boats. I wish I had one.
Well you can always take mine out whenever you want!
Thanks! That's really nice of you. I'll have to take you up on that offer sometime.
No problem! I love taking people out on my boat. It's a lot of fun.
I bet it is! I've always wanted to go water skiing.
That's a blast! I love water skiing.
You seem like you have a lot of fun activities!
I do! I like to keep busy. I don't like to sit around and do nothing.
Me neither! I like to stay active.
That's what's up! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! What other activities do you like to do?
I like to go off-roading in my truck. It's really fun.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun.
I'll have to try it sometime!
